unit.utterance: E maumwi gabaw gaw ndai shan nga shan nga yi ni nrung n tu mat ai lam.
unit.utterance_translation: Well, the title of the story is the story that the female deer lost its horn.

unit.utterance: Moi shawng de da ndai shan nga ni gaw ah yi mada ah la mada nrung grai tsawm na maren mara re tu ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: Long ago, it's said, well, deer had very beautiful horns, both the male and female.

unit.utterance_translation: (Horns of both male and female) were the same.

unit.utterance: grai ma kabrim tsawm ai i.
unit.utterance_translation: (Their horns) shined and were very beautiful, OK?

unit.utterance: dan re tu ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: (This kind of horns) grew, it's said.

unit.utterance: Shaloi she lani mi hta she ndai ndai shaloi gaw ndai shan nga yi shan nga wa hkan wa ni masum nga ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: Then, one day, this time, there were three deers, a female deer, a male deer, and their father, it's said.

unit.utterance_translation: (They are) a female, a male, and their father, OK?

unit.utterance: shan wa ni... shingkra hkan wa ni nga ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: They, they lived without a mother.

unit.utterance_translation: (They) lived in a forest and

unit.utterance: shan wa ni grai pyaw na nga.
unit.utterance_translation: they and their father lived happily.

unit.utterance: grai pyaw na nga re she
unit.utterance_translation: They lived very happily and

unit.utterance: lani mi gaw ndai shi na wa gaw dai lu sha tam sa sa na nga na she
unit.utterance_translation: one day, well, her father said (he) will go to look for food and

unit.utterance: shi wa gaw shi ga ma npyaw na i.
unit.utterance_translation: Because (there was) also a bad news, OK?

unit.utterance: dai shaloi nga yang gaw
unit.utterance_translation: That time

unit.utterance: maling hta jaugawng ni grai prang ai nga hpe na ai majaw
unit.utterance_translation: because (their father) heard (a news) that there came many hunters in the forest

unit.utterance: shi gaw hi na kasha hpe tsun ai.
unit.utterance_translation: he (the father) said to their children.

unit.utterance: makaw yen magam dai ni gaw nanau gara de mung hkum sa re lu.
unit.utterance_translation: "My daughter and son, you two don't go anywhere today.

unit.utterance: nanau na matu ah wa lu sha grai law hkra la wa na.
unit.utterance_translation: "I will take so many foods for you two.

unit.utterance: gade ma hkum sa.
unit.utterance_translation: "Don't go anywhere."

unit.utterance: ya mung shi ga ni grai npyaw taw nga ai.
unit.utterance_translation: "Now, the news is not very good."

unit.utterance: nta kaw sha ndai kaw sha nga taw yaw.
unit.utterance_translation: "Be only at home."

unit.utterance: gade de hkum sa yaw ngu na tsun kau da ai.
unit.utterance_translation: "Don't go anywhere," (he) said, it's said.

unit.utterance: dai she dai rai na hkawm mat sai.
unit.utterance_translation: Then, (he) went travel.

unit.utterance: dai shaloi shani du yang she
unit.utterance_translation: Then, the daytime came and

unit.utterance: dai num sha wa gaw grai lam mayu na hku nga.
unit.utterance_translation: the girl deer was eager to go wandering very much, it's like this.

unit.utterance: lagaw ni gaya wa ai hte shi gaw grai sa mayu.
unit.utterance_translation: Her feet became itchy and she wanted to go very much.

unit.utterance: shawoi na oh loi mi grai lam ja ai.
unit.utterance_translation: Formerly, she wandered very much.

unit.utterance: myit nsu ai
unit.utterance_translation: (She) was not mature.

unit.utterance: rai na hku rai nga
unit.utterance_translation: It was like this.

unit.utterance: dan jang she shi gaw lani mi shi gaw gahpu hpe tsun ai.
unit.utterance_translation: Then, one day, she said to her brother.

unit.utterance_translation: "Brother, I will go to wander to the forest over there, to uncle boar and brothers porcupine."

unit.utterance: hkum sa law.
unit.utterance_translation: (Her brother said) "Don't go."

unit.utterance: awa tsun da ai nang nna ai i nga yang mung
unit.utterance_translation: (He) said "Didn't you hear what our father said?" and...

unit.utterance: raitim le ah ba e dai ram nre law.

unit.utterance: ngai akatsi sha lagu sa na bai wa na yaw.

unit.utterance_translation: (she) said and she went out secretly although (her brother said) "Don't go."

unit.utterance: lagu sa mat wa re she
unit.utterance_translation: (She) went secretly and

unit.utterance: ora nam kaw du yang
unit.utterance_translation: (she) arrived at the forest and

unit.utterance_translation: (she) met a hunter and

unit.utterance_translation: the man, the hunter prepared to hit her and

unit.utterance_translation: because she met (him) as soon as she saw (him)

unit.utterance: hprawng na aten lu mat na she
unit.utterance_translation: (She) got time to run away and

unit.utterance: shi gaw nrung kaw hkra mat ai.

unit.utterance: shi na nrung kaw hkra mat na she
unit.utterance_translation: (The bullet) touched her horn and

unit.utterance_translation: she had her horn broken at once and, OK?

unit.utterance_translation: her horn was broken and

unit.utterance_translation: she ran home at once and

unit.utterance: shi na kahpu tsun ai
unit.utterance_translation: her brother said,

unit.utterance: ya hpa baw byin wa sata nga yang

unit.utterance: nang shaga mung nmadat ai gaw.
